Text:
just so you know, 4gb = 4096mb roughly, not 4000

in case you wanted your size to be as close to 4gb as possible
Yeah i put 4096 in the file size but i used avchdcoder and i read on another torrent that you got to use 4296, next time i'll get it dead on hopefully

stinky, be careful not to go too big as it will not fit on an external. A couple past blu-ray examples are Wall-E and Office Space by akamaru which were just a little bit too large. anyway just a heads up to test them before you upload. Thanks for the movie much appreciated will seed my usual 3:1
yeh its gotta b 4296 MB (probably get away with a couple more megs) on avchdcoder its a a pain took me a while to do the maths cos 1mb = 1,000,000 bytes on there.  Cheers 4 the up ;)

Has anyone downloaded 100% yet ?
It shows only 0.078 available and it is really slow.....

Anyway thanks for the upload stinkyrocks... this is a great movie... I'll continue seeding once I get it....
mybad, i use ripbot, and its 4096 with ripbot
Sorry about the slow upload speed, I don't know what's up with my internet at the mo, been really sluggish lately, could take a few more days to upload fully
My next upload will be bruno, when this one finally finishes uploading, let me know when someone has got 100%
